about.title: About
about.heading: Where People Meet Music
about.paragraph1: PLAN-G Entertainment is a music label dedicated to discovering authentic artists and maximizing their potential.
about.paragraph2: We believe in the power of original artistry and innovative sound. We build deep connections between artists and fans, preserve the true essence of music, and open new possibilities.
about.paragraph3: From music production to global distribution, we stand alongside artists throughout their creative journey, becoming a steadfast partner to help their voices reach the world.

item1.heading: Welcome to PLAN-G Entertainment
item1.content: PLAN-G Entertainment launches its official website. A new chapter begins where music meets vision. Discover our artists and their latest releases.

contact.title: Contact
contact.openToIdeas: We're Always Open to New Ideas
contact.description1: Whether you're an artist looking for representation, a brand seeking partnership opportunities, or a media outlet interested in our story, we'd love to hear from you.
